resources.string:
Use the count limit to get notified when the specified limit is reached.

Phone will vibrate mildly when 1 and 2 counts are remaining and will vibrate for a longer period of time when it reaches the limit.

You can continue to count even after limit is reached.

1. Just press Start Counting to start. 

2. Use Volume buttons to count.

3. To exit, use Back arrow or press Back button twice.
